amendment.description: Amendment directs $1 million of the overall appropriation for the Minerals Management Service to States and tribes for auditing purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding (by transfer) for royalty and offshore minerals management in order to facilitate audits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Maloney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
